code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:5000/api/blog';export const blogService={getPosts:async()=>{const response=await axios.get(API_URL);return response.data;},addBlogPost:async(title,content)=>{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,{title,content});return response.data;},deleteBlogPost:async id=>{const response=await axios.delete(`${API_URL}/${id}`);return response.data;}};
